links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part One

wikitext.*:
'''Ulmonan''' was the name of [[Ulmo]]'s halls, located at the [[Hidden Half|bottom]] of the [[Vaiya|Outer Ocean]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref>{{HM|LT1}}, pp. 61-2, 68, 83, 85-6, 214</ref>

== Etymology ==
''Ulmonan'' is apparently a [[Qenya]] name; the first element is of course  ''[[Ulmo#Etymology|Ulmo]]'', while the second element was, according to [[Christopher Tolkien]], never explained by [[J.R.R. Tolkien|his father]].<ref>{{LT1|Appendix}}, p. 270</ref>
